capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Requires advanced understanding and application of financial processes, policies, and systems to ensure accurate accounting and compliance with legislative frameworks.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Must be responsible for accurate financial reporting and compliance with relevant legislation, policy, and statutory frameworks.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Needs to effectively plan and prioritise financial operations and reporting to support the organisation's strategic decision-making.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Requires the ability to analyse financial information, identify issues, and develop practical solutions to support financial sustainability.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Must communicate complex financial information clearly to stakeholders and provide expert advice to support decision-making.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Essential to act ethically and professionally, ensuring transparency in financial management and reporting.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Requires self-motivation and a commitment to continuous learning in the evolving field of finance and accounting standards.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Understanding and application of project management principles in establishing new finance operations and systems.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.description: Analyzing financial data to support strategic decision-making and ensure financial sustainability.

skills.name: Legislative Compliance
skills.description: Understanding and applying finance legislation, directions, policies, and standards.

skills.name: Stakeholder Communication
skills.description: Communicating financial information and advice effectively to various stakeholders.

generalRole.title: Senior Financial Accountant
generalRole.description: This role involves advanced financial management, including analysis, advice, and reporting to ensure compliance and support strategic decision-making within a government context.
